name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify SHARK - Product scraper & store spy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A useful tool that lets you spy on Shopify stores and extract product data as an importable xlsx/csv file for Shopify stores.
